comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
This appears to be photo of Charles Lindbergh (b. 1902 - d. 1974) as a young boy on the White House lawn, with what appears to be the East Wing behind him and the Treasury Building off to the right side of the photo.  

It has been reported that Lindbergh did take part in the traditional White House Easter Egg Roll as a young boy (his father was Charles August Lindbergh, member of the House of Representatives from Minnesota).  It seems he is swinging a stick  towards the ground in the photo, and given the number of children on the lawn, this very well may be that event.
